product_name: Lowa S-Crown Mesh Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Shoes built for warm weather with mesh for ventilation and breathability, the men's Lowa S-Crown Mesh trail-running shoes offer support and traction to pursue your passion when the trail is calling. Patented "STG", soft-to-ground midsoles provide the correct combination of shock absorption, targeted cushioning, stability and grip. Floating tongue construction has hex-mesh vent holes with micro-mesh cover over the tongues to keep out dirt and scree. Medium volume; cool and comfy breathable mesh linings; Ortholite footbeds; Bi-density EVA midsoles with polyurethane inserts for stability. Rubber outsoles on Lowa S-Trail Mesh trail-running shoes offer traction on varied terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Shoes built for warm weather with mesh for ventilation and breathability, the men's Lowa S-Crown Mesh trail-running shoes offer support and traction to pursue your passion when the trail is calling.
